001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.validator;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
005import io.restassured.response.Response;
006import java.util.List;
007
008/**
009 * Defines a contract for validating API responses.
010 *
011 * <p>Implementations of this interface validate HTTP responses against a set of assertions,
012 * ensuring the response meets expected criteria.
013 *
014 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
015 */
016public interface RestResponseValidator {
017
018   /**
019    * Validates an API response against the provided assertions.
020    *
021    * <p>Implementations extract relevant data from the response and evaluate it using the assertions.
022    *
023    * @param response   The API response to validate.
024    * @param assertions The assertions used to verify response correctness.
025    * @param <T>        The expected data type for assertion validation.
026    * @return A list of assertion results, indicating pass or failure for each assertion.
027    * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the response or assertions are null.
028    */
029   <T> List<AssertionResult<T>> validateResponse(Response response, Assertion... assertions);
030
031}
